1.content:
John is in his 3rd year of college at his university. He is 6’3’’ with blue eyes and brown hair. He is very social, which makes him well known at campus. He is a very smart guy, and top of his class. Though today, his life will change forever.

Now, it is up to the reader. Where will John shrink?
1.title: The Start of a new life

11.content: There will be 3 parts to shrinking in class.
11.title: Class

12.content:
John is currently in his dorm, waiting for his classmate from his psychology class to come over. Her name is Hannah. She is a year younger than John but is known for slacking off and being late with her assignments. The reason as to why John picked her as his partner for the Psychology project is, the professor told the class that each student had to choose someone that they rarely work with for the assignment. John thought that if he picked her, he may gain bonus points on the grade.

John hears knocking on his door and assumes it is Hannah. John goes to open up the door and sees that it is Hannah. Hannah is wearing flip flops with a t-shirt and booty shorts. She has blond hair, weighs around 150 pounds, and has a belly piercing. John let’s Hannah into his dorm and walks to his room with her.

“Hey I don’t really feel like working right now, let’s just chill.” Hannah tells John.

“Let’s just work on this project for a bit and then we can chill.” John responds.

“Nah, I don’t really feel like it. Let’s just do what I said.” Hannah says.

John’s head starts racing and starts to go numb. He feels really dizzy and feels himself shrinking to approximately 6 inches.

John looks up and sees Hannah looking down at him smiling. In his eyes, Hannah is really gigantic and fears what she may do to him.

“Yeah, we are just gonna chill. Now, I wonder if I should just stay here or go back to my dorm.” Hannah says.
12.title: Dorm

13.content: Where does John Shrink when he is outside?
13.title: Outside (still on campus)

131.content:
John walks out of campus to the parking lot in order to get to his car. On the way there, he bumps into a prostitute that looks to be in her 40’s. She asks you if you want to pay to be with her but you tell her to get lost.

“You’re going to regret it honey.” The Prostitute says.

When you take out your car keys, you start to feel lightheaded and notice yourself shrinking to 3 inches.

You look at your surroundings and hope that the prostitute is not looking at you. When you start walking, you hear a loud voice booming and notice that it’s the prostitute.

“Oh my god! You are so tiny!! You are mine now little man! The prostitute says to you.

You freak out and when try to run as fast as you can, but the gigantic prostitute puts her humongous foot down next to you. She then picks you up and brings you closer to her massive face. She then plants a kiss on you which makes you covered in saliva.

“I hope you love older woman tiny man! Because I am never letting you go!” The gigantic Prostitute booms.

You try to squirm in order to get out of the prostitute’s grip, but no avail. She is holding you tightly and realize that you are stuck with her.

“Ooooh trying to squirm I see. You will be doing a lot of that with me.” The gigantic prostitute booms. “How about you do that but in a spot that I like.”

The gigantic prostitute lowers you to the front of her panties and drops you in. You feel a lot of her tree-sized pubic hair smash into your face and notice that it is like a cave in here. The air is very musky and you see her massive pussy in front of you. You try to squirm but instead of that being a positive thing for you, it turns out to be quite the opposite. You are pleasing the gigantic prostitute.

“Turns out you do love older woman. You should have had sex with me at your normal size but with you being tiny size, I can do whatever I want with you. Now, I’m going to leave your campus and take you back home in my panties so we can have some alone time.” The massive prostitute says.

The prostitute goes back to her car and drives back to her apartment. On the way back, you passed out in her panties due to the strong smell.

When you get back to her apartment, the gigantic prostitute takes off her clothes until she is in her bra and panties. She also takes off her high heels and puts it in the closet.

The gigantic prostitute proceeds to lie down in her bed and takes you out of her panties. She then shakes you and you finally wake up.

“Normally, I would charge you for being with me. But. Since you’re no larger than my fingers, and we are going to be together forever, I’ll let it slide.” The gigantic prostitute says.

You cannot believe what is happening. You were going to go home for the weekend to surprise your family but instead, the only “family” you are seeing is this gigantic prostitute.

“Now, my feet are killing me for standing up all day. Use your hands and mouth to massage my feet!” The gigantic prostitute says.

Do you obey her or do you try and escape?
131.title: Front of the Campus

info.brief_description: In this alternate reality, the main character John shrinks in his University.
info.description:
I strongly advise the readers to add to this story and try to have fun with it. My only rules for this interaction are:
1. No Male Giants
2. No killing the main character
3. If you are stuck on what to add, feel free to message me. I will be more than happy to help out.
